thread.title: BRIEF-Kingdee International Software Group Co Enters Cooperation Deal With ‍Huawei Technologies Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kingdee International Software Group Co Enters Cooperation Deal With ‍Huawei Technologies Co

organizations.name: reuters) - kingdee international software group co ltd
brief-kingdee international software group co enters cooperation deal with ‍huawei technologies co

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Kingdee International Software Group Co Ltd:
* ‍CO AND HUAWEI TECHNOLOGIES CO., LTD. ENTER STRATEGIC COOPERATION AGREEMENT ​
* TO COOPERATE WITH HUAWEI IN PUBLIC CLOUD AREAS, BIG DATA, ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECHNOLOGY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
